backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor storing per‑principal fitness data with workouts, meals, activities, and goals, including access control and profile management.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with linked files, components, tests, and confidence for the app’s fitness, nutrition, and activity tracking functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides human‑written one‑line summaries for each frontend file describing its role in the app.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind and theme variables for light/dark modes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Bootstrap HTML file mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry configuring routing, authentication flow, profile setup gating, and page layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth and clearing React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog prompting new users to set display name and units and saving the profile.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper providing navigation and page container for authenticated routes.
frontend/src/components/layout/PrimaryNa: Sidebar and mobile navigation component rendering links based on current route and user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current user's profile using the active actor with loading state tied to identity availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, logout, identity persistence, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for CRUD operations on workouts, goals, meals, and activities via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and utility animations.
frontend/src/lib/nutritionEstimator.ts: Generates deterministic nutrition estimates for meal photos based on filename hashing.
frontend/src/lib/units.ts: Utility functions for formatting and converting distances and weights between metric and imperial units.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, Internet Identity provider, and React Query client.
frontend/src/pages/ActivityPage.tsx: Activity tracking page that starts/stops sessions, simulates metrics, and saves results using backend hooks.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays a dashboard that aggregates weekly workouts, activities, meals, and goals into summary cards using user profile units.
frontend/src/pages/GoalsPage.tsx: Provides UI for creating, viewing, and deleting fitness goals with progress tracking and type selection.
frontend/src/pages/NutritionPage.tsx: Allows logging meals with photo upload, simulated AI nutrition estimation, and manual nutrition entry and deletion.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Manages user profile settings including display name, units, data export, and full data deletion.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutsPage.tsx: Enables logging workouts with exercises and sets, viewing existing workouts, and deleting entries.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL and hash parameters, and persisting them in sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app goals, required features, images, and known issues for a premium fitness tracker.
